    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Attempts to instantiate a connection pool. After an attempt is made, this method will verify that a connection has been made. Console is alerted if connection pool is established or not.

      • verifyTableExists

        public void verifyTableExists()
        Verifies that the UHC database table exists. If the table does not exist, this method will attempt to create it.

      • handlePlayerExit

        public void handlePlayerExit(java.util.UUID id)

      • query

        public DatabaseQuery query(java.lang.String query)
        Executes a query using a PreparedStatement
        Parameters:
        String - query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        DatabaseQuery containing the connection and the ResultSet.

      • executeUpdate

        public void executeUpdate(java.sql.PreparedStatement st)
        Executes a specified PreparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        PreparedStatement - to execute.

      • obtainConnection

        public java.sql.Connection obtainConnection()
        Obtains a connection from the connection pool. Alerts console if anything goes wrong while obtaining said Connection
        Returns:
        Connection or null if an error occurs.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Takes a Connection passed to it and closes it while alerting the console if anything goes wrong. This should be used inside of a finally block of a try-catch.
        Parameters:
        Connection - conn - The connection to close

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the Hikari Connection Pool if it's open.
